posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Cummings
I would appreciate anyone's help in obtaining any of the following:

N172 Old Judge - Charlie Bennett, Jimmy Cooney, Mike Griffin (arms folded or batting pose), Hardie Henderson, Jim McTamany, Taylor Shaffer, James White

Cameo Pepsin Gum pin - John Anderson, George Cuppy, Emerson Hawley, William Hoy, Bill Lange, Candy LaChance, Charles Nichols, Jake Stenzel, Jack Stivetts


Would also like to find a reasonably priced Sporting News insert from 1899 of Bill Lange.

Posted By: john/z28jd
You gotta update this Kevin,not only were you way down at the bottom of the wantlists but i know youve gotten at least a few from this list so its not accurate.....plus isnt there some new ones? [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Thank you for watching over me, John. It's like having a 19th century guardian angel.

I've updated the list. Now who can help?
